Name: Staff with Tutankhamun's Names
Description: This long staff of King Tutankhamun is completely covered with gold. It has decorations of glass inlays at the top and beneath the handhold, which is formed like an open lotus flower. Hieroglyphic text, written from left to right in gold against a blue background, states the king's names and titles. The end of this staff is decorated with cloisonne feather designs.
